place.name: WOOTTON COURTENAY
place.gazetteerText: WOOTTON-COURTNEY, a parish, with a village, in Williton district, Somerset; 10 miles W of Williton r. station. Post town, Dunster, under Taunton. Acres, 3,145. Real property, £2,291. Pop., 378. Houses, 73. The manor belonged anciently to the Courtneys, and belongs now to the Hon. R. H. Dutton. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £386.* Patron, Eton College. The church was restored in 1867. Charities, £38. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
